Package me.mthw.forge.ingest.analyzer.volume

Class VolumeAnalyzerBitlocker

java.lang.Object
me.mthw.forge.ingest.analyzer.Analyzer
me.mthw.forge.ingest.analyzer.volume.VolumeAnalyzerBitlocker
public class VolumeAnalyzerBitlocker extends Analyzer
The VolumeAnalyzerBitlocker class is a specialized implementation of the Analyzer class designed to process volumes and extract metadata related to BitLocker encryption. This class is responsible for identifying and analyzing BitLocker-protected volumes, extracting encryption details, and creating blackboard artifacts for forensic analysis. Key Features: - Processes volumes to extract BitLocker metadata, including encryption methods, creation times, and metadata entries. - Identifies and processes BitLocker keys and descriptions. - Converts extracted metadata into blackboard attributes for forensic analysis. - Creates or updates layout files to make attributes visible in the user interface. - Supports the creation of blackboard artifacts for BitLocker volumes. Attributes: - FORGE_BITLOCKER_KEY_GUID: Represents the GUID of the BitLocker key. - FORGE_BITLOCKER_KEY_PROTECTION_TYPE: Describes the type of key protection used. - FORGE_BITLOCKER_ENCRYPTION_METHOD: Specifies the encryption method of the volume. - FORGE_BITLOCKER_DESCRIPTION: Provides a description of the volume. - FORGE_BITLOCKER_KEY: Contains the keys in JSON format. Exceptions: - TskCoreException: Thrown when an error occurs while interacting with the Sleuth Kit. - BlackboardException: Thrown when an error occurs while adding attributes to the blackboard. - IOException: Thrown when an I/O error occurs while reading the volume. - IllegalAccessError: Thrown when there is an illegal access error. - NoCurrentCaseException: Thrown when there is no current case available. Reference: For more details on the BitLocker Drive Encryption (BDE) format, refer to: https://github.com/libyal/libbde/blob/main/documentation/BitLocker%20Drive%20Encryption%20(BDE)%20format.asciidoc

    • process

      public boolean process(org.sleuthkit.datamodel.AbstractFile file)
      Processes the given abstract file. This method is not supported for the VolumeAnalyzerBitlocker class and will always throw an UnsupportedOperationException.
      Specified by:
      process in class Analyzer
      Parameters:
      file - The abstract file to process.
      Returns:
      true if the processing is successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:

    • process

      public boolean process(org.sleuthkit.datamodel.Volume volume) throws org.sleuthkit.datamodel.TskCoreException, org.sleuthkit.datamodel.Blackboard.BlackboardException, IOException, IllegalAccessError, org.sleuthkit.autopsy.casemodule.NoCurrentCaseException
      Processes a given volume to extract BitLocker metadata and attributes.
      Specified by:
      process in class Analyzer
      Parameters:
      volume - The volume to process.
      Returns:
      true if the processing is successful.
      Throws:
      org.sleuthkit.datamodel.TskCoreException - If an error occurs while interacting with the Sleuth Kit.
      org.sleuthkit.datamodel.Blackboard.BlackboardException - If an error occurs while adding attributes to the blackboard.
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while reading the volume.
      IllegalAccessError - If there is an illegal access error.
      org.sleuthkit.autopsy.casemodule.NoCurrentCaseException - If there is no current case available. This method performs the following steps: - Reads and parses the BitLocker metadata from the volume. - Extracts encryption method, creation time, and metadata entries. - Identifies and processes BitLocker keys and descriptions. - Converts extracted metadata into blackboard attributes. - Creates or updates a layout file for the volume to make attributes visible in the UI. - Adds the extracted attributes and metadata as artifacts to the case.

    • createArtifact

      protected void createArtifact() throws org.sleuthkit.datamodel.Blackboard.BlackboardException
      Creates a blackboard artifact for a Bitlocker volume.
      Specified by:
      createArtifact in class Analyzer
      Throws:
      org.sleuthkit.datamodel.Blackboard.BlackboardException - if there is an error creating the artifact on the blackboard.

    • createAttributes

      protected void createAttributes()
      Initializes and populates the attributes map with predefined attributes related to BitLocker volume analysis. Each attribute is associated with a unique key, a type, and a description. Attributes added: - FORGE_BITLOCKER_KEY_GUID: Represents the GUID of the BitLocker key. - FORGE_BITLOCKER_KEY_PROTECTION_TYPE: Describes the type of key protection used. - FORGE_BITLOCKER_ENCRYPTION_METHOD: Specifies the encryption method of the volume. - FORGE_BITLOCKER_DESCRIPTION: Provides a description of the volume. - FORGE_BITLOCKER_KEY: Contains the keys in JSON format.
      Specified by:
      createAttributes in class Analyzer
